title: I have a pixel 4 on Google FI. Every so often, usually after reboot it asks me to re-activate. Help
content: I keep losing activation on my Pixel 4 with Google FI. Usually after reboot or charging with USB. It keeps giving error messages also that bounce between an issue with SIM 1 or SIM 2. I can't have a cellphone with such inconsistent service and regularly losing service (in areas with great service). As I'm doing this, I cannot even submit (initially) because the "Captcha" couldn't connect
